Description: Scales the effectiveness of Crippling Blow for melee attacks at roughly max base skill. 1.0 = no effect. 2.0 = double damage on crit at max base skill. 4.0 = 4x damage etc. ACE DEFAULT IS 6.0
The cap on what proportion of armor can be reduced on melee AR. Should be between 0 and 1. Default is 0.6 for a 60% reduction in armor.
Scales the effectiveness of Crippling Blow for magic attacks at roughly max base skill. 1.0 = no effect. 2.0 = double damage on crit at max base skill. 4.0 = 4x damage etc.  ACE DEFAULT IS 6.0
The extra crit rating Light Weapons will get when imbued with CB. For every 1.0 added to this number, this equals 100 crit rating.
The extra crit rating Two-Handed Weapons will get when imbued with CS. For every 1.0 added to this number, this equals 100 crit rating.
scales void projectile dmg
The amount that a light weapon with Crippling Blow will land a critical strike. Default is 0.05(5%). A value of 1.00 would be 100% crit strike chance. be CAREFUL
The amount of flat damage added to heavy weapons per tink. Note for each damage event the added damage will be randomized between 1 and this value. Default is 0.
The amount that a twohanded weapon with Crippling Blow will land a critical strike. Default is 0.05(5%). A value of 1.00 would be 100% crit strike chance. be CAREFUL
scales the amount of xp received by players
The damage multiplier done by phantom weapons vs shields. Default is 1.0x
Scales missile weapon damage for PvP
Scales melee weapon damage for PvP
The extra crit rating Crossbow will get when imbued with CS. For every 1.0 added to this number, this equals 100 crit rating.
Adjust the chance of a rare to spawn as a percentage. Default is 0.04, or 1 in 2,500. Max is 100, or every eligible drop.
The damage multiplier done by phantom weapons vs armor. Default is 1.0x
the number of seconds a generator for regions at which spawns its next set of objects
The extra crit rating Two-Handed Weapons will get when imbued with CB. For every 1.0 added to this number, this equals 100 crit rating.
Scales the chance for epic cantrips to drop, relative to other cantrip levels in the tier. Defaults to 1.0, as per end of retail
The extra crit rating Crossbow will get when imbued with CB. For every 1.0 added to this number, this equals 100 crit rating.
Scales the amount of luminance received by players
the number of seconds before unique items sold to vendors disappear
the maximum vitae penalty a player can have
Modifier for Aetheria drop rate, 1 being normal
The amount that an xbow with Crippling Blow will land a critical strike. Default is 0.05(5%). A value of 1.00 would be 100% crit strike chance. be CAREFUL
The amount that a finesse weapon with Crippling Blow will land a critical strike. Default is 0.05(5%). A value of 1.00 would be 100% crit strike chance. be CAREFUL
the number of seconds a generator profile for regions is delayed from returning to free slots
The speed multiplier applied to fast missiles. Defaults to retail value of 1.2
The amount of flat damage added to finesse weapons per tink. Note for each damage event the added damage will be randomized between 1 and this value. Default is 0.
scales all quest min delta time between solves, 1 being normal
Scales consumable animation speed. Allows players to eat or drink at a faster rate if set to a higher number.
The amount of flat damage added to xbow weapons per tink. Note for each damage event the added damage will be randomized between 1 and this value. Default is 0.
Scales the amount of damage players take from Void Magic. Defaults to 0.5, as per retail. For earlier content where DRR isn't as readily available, this can be adjusted for balance.
Scales the effectiveness of Critical Strike Imbue for missile attacks at roughly max base skill. 1.0 = default effect. 2.0 = Crit chance double of what the player normally would have with a CS weapon
the number of seconds for the chess ai to start. defaults to -1 (disabled)
the amount of vitae penalty a player gets per death
for melee players, the maximum angle before a TurnTo is required. retail appeared to have required a TurnTo even for the smallest of angle offsets.
Scales the distance the monsters become alerted and aggro the players
The extra crit rating Thrown Weapons will get when imbued with CB. For every 1.0 added to this number, this equals 100 crit rating.

Scales the effectiveness of IgnoreMagicArmor (ie. hollow weapons) in pvp battles. 1.0 = full effectiveness / ignore all enchantments on armor (default), 0.5 = half effectiveness / use half enchantments from armor, 0.0 = no effectiveness / use full enchantments from armor
Scales the effectiveness of Crippling Blow for missile attacks at roughly max base skill. 1.0 = no effect. 2.0 = double damage on crit at max base skill. 4.0 = 4x damage etc.  ACE DEFAULT IS 6.0
Cap cloak proc chance to this percentage (100.0 will effectively use the standard ACE proc rate).
The extra crit rating Finesse Weapons will get when imbued with CB. For every 1.0 added to this number, this equals 100 crit rating.
The amount of flat damage added to twohanded weapons per tink. Note for each damage event the added damage will be randomized between 1 and this value. Default is 0.
the level that advocates are automatically bestowed by Advocate Fane if advocate_fane_auto_bestow is true
The amount of flat damage added to thrown weapons per tink. Note for each damage event the added damage will be randomized between 1 and this value. Default is 0.
The number of seconds a player unlocking a chest has exclusive access to first opening the chest.
The extra crit rating Heavy Weapons will get when imbued with CB. For every 1.0 added to this number, this equals 100 crit rating.
The extra crit rating Heavy Weapons will get when imbued with CS. For every 1.0 added to this number, this equals 100 crit rating.
Scales the effectiveness of Critical Strike Imbue for melee attacks at roughly max base skill. 1.0 = default effect. 2.0 = Crit chance double of what the player normally would have with a CS weapon
Modifier for trophies dropped on creature death
The amount of flat damage added to bow weapons per tink. Note for each damage event the added damage will be randomized between 1 and this value. Default is 0.
The amount that a bow with Crippling Blow will land a critical strike. Default is 0.05(5%). A value of 1.00 would be 100% crit strike chance. be CAREFUL
The amount of flat damage added to light weapons per tink. Note for each damage event the added damage will be randomized between 1 and this value. Default is 0.

Scales the effectiveness of IgnoreMagicResist (ie. hollow weapons) in pvp battles. 1.0 = full effectiveness / ignore all resistances from life enchantments (default), 0.5 = half effectiveness / use half resistances from life enchantments, 0.0 = no effectiveness / use full resistances from life enchantments
The extra crit rating Thrown Weapons will get when imbued with CS. For every 1.0 added to this number, this equals 100 crit rating.

The extra crit rating Finesse Weapons will get when imbued with CS. For every 1.0 added to this number, this equals 100 crit rating.
The amount that a heavy weapon with Crippling Blow will land a critical strike. Default is 0.05(5%). A value of 1.00 would be 100% crit strike chance. be CAREFUL
the number of seconds, in addition to pk_respite_timer, that a player killer is set to non-player killer status after first exiting training academy
The extra crit rating Bow will get when imbued with CS. For every 1.0 added to this number, this equals 100 crit rating.
The cap on what proportion of armor can be reduced on missile AR. Should be between 0 and 1. Default is 0.6 for a 60% reduction in armor.
the number of seconds that a player killer is set to non-player killer status after dying to another player killer

for advanced player spell casting, the maximum angle to target release a spell projectile. retail seemed to default to value of around 20, although some players seem to prefer a higher 45 degree angle
